com.tomscz.afswinx.localization

Class LocalizationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afswinx.localization.LocalizationUtils

  • public class LocalizationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to transform text to text based on current localization.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getTextValueFromLocalOrExtendBundle

        public static java.lang.String getTextValueFromLocalOrExtendBundle(java.lang.String text,
                                                   java.util.ResourceBundle bundle)
        This method return string from bundle based on bundle.
        Parameters:
        text - which will be found in bundle
        bundle - in which will be found text
        Returns:
        text in resource bundle or only text given in parameter if text couldn't be found in bundle or bundle is null

      • getTextFromExtendBundle

        public static java.lang.String getTextFromExtendBundle(java.lang.String text,
                                       java.util.ResourceBundle bundle,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags)
        This method return string from bundle based on bundle.
        Parameters:
        text - which will be found in bundle
        bundle - in which will be found text
        tags - another parameters which will be given to bundle in order in which was received
        Returns:
        text in resource bundle or only text given in parameter if text couldn't be found in bundle or bundle is null

      • getTextFromBundle

        private static java.lang.String getTextFromBundle(java.util.ResourceBundle formBundle,
                                 java.util.ResourceBundle afSwinxBundle,
                                 java.lang.String text,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags)
        This method return string from bundle based on bundle. See LocalizationUtils#chooseBundle(ResourceBundle, ResourceBundle, ResourceBundle) for more detail about choosing process. If text is not found there then default AFSwinxBundle is tried to found string
        Parameters:
        formBundle - form bundle
        afSwinxBundle - global swinx bundle
        text - which will be found in bundle
        tags - another parameters which will be given to bundle in order in which was received
        Returns:
        see getTextFromBundle(String, ResourceBundle, ArrayList) for more details about return

      • getTextFromBundle

        private static java.lang.String getTextFromBundle(java.lang.String text,
                                 java.util.ResourceBundle bundle,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags)
        This method find text in bundle and return it. If bundle is null or text is not found then input text will be returned
        Parameters:
        text - to find in bundle
        bundle - bundle in which will be found text
        tags - another parameters which will be given to bundle in order in which was received
        Returns:
        text in bundle or only text given in parameter if bundle doesn't exists or text couldn't be found in that bundle

      • chooseBundle

        private static java.util.ResourceBundle chooseBundle(java.util.ResourceBundle... bundle)
                                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method decide which bundle is used, it simply tests bundle given in parameters and if one of them is not null then used it.
        Parameters:
        bundle - which will be checked if not null then bundle is used
        Returns:
        first bundle in array which is not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are only null bundle

      • createDefaultBundle

        private static java.util.ResourceBundle createDefaultBundle()
        This method create default resource bundle which is implemented in this framework
        Returns:
        framework default resource bundle
